creator: jan.kester@moneyextra.es
text:
The class SSLStaticProvider (or should it be SSL.StaticProvider?) contains an 
import of the com.sun.net.ssl package of Sun's jsse implementation. This 
shouldn't be hard-coded, as it does not allow now to change to other 
implementations.

Version 1.6 Alpha

creator: beth.moraes@rj.previdenciasocial.gov.br
text:
Dear, engineer
My simple http test is the following:
Test period: 1 minute(controled by watch) 
Delay: constant, 1000 ms
Threads: 1 
Expected result: 60 threads
Final result: 30 gets ( the half )
Why does it happen? Always the half of the expected result
Regards , Beth

creator: beth.moraes@rj.previdenciasocial.gov.br
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
